sentences.en: ...daytime temperatures of up to forty degrees centigrade.
A step in temperature on the Fahrenheit scale is smaller than a step on the Centigrade scale.
sentences.cn: 华氏温度计的一度比摄氏温度计的一度小一些。

sentences.en: A step in temperature on the FahrenheIt'scale is smaller than a step on the Centigrade scale.
sentences.cn: 华氏温度计的一度比摄氏温度计的一度小一些.

sentences.en: Here the temperature never goes below zero centigrade.
sentences.cn: 这里的气温很少降到摄氏零度以下.

sentences.en: The animal temperatures drops to just over zero centigrade.
sentences.cn: 动物的温度下降到仅比摄氏零度略高.

sentences.en: The boiling point of water is 100 degrees centigrade.
The highest temperature during the day will be two degrees centigrade.
sentences.cn: 白天最高气温将只有零上二度。

sentences.en: The number at the bottom is the recommended water temperature in centigrade.
sentences.cn: 底部的数字为建议性摄氏度水温。

sentences.en: The number at the bottom is the recommended water temperature in Centigrade.
sentences.cn: 底部的数字就是推荐的摄氏水温。

sentences.en: The temperature dropped to minus ten degrees centigrade.
sentences.cn: 温度降到摄氏零下十度.

sentences.en: The temperature here sometimes goes up to thirty - nine degrees centigrade.
sentences.cn: 这里有时候也能热到39度.

sentences.en: The temperature in this room is twenty degrees centigrade.
sentences.cn: 这个房间里的温度是摄氏20度.

sentences.en: This number is unique in temperature readings; it is unique because -40 is the only point at which the fahrenheit and centigrade scales meet.
sentences.cn: 在温度系统中，这个数字是独一无二的；它独一无二的理由是：-40是华氏温标和摄氏温标唯一相同的点。

sentences.en: This thermometer is calibrated by centigrade.
sentences.cn: 这种温度计是用摄氏百分度标定的。

sentences.en: Water freezes at zero degrees centigrade.
When the thermometer is at 0 degree centigrade, water will freeze.
sentences.cn: 当温度计降至摄氏零度时, 水便会结冰.

words.tran_cn: 百分之一的；百分的；百进制的
摄氏的；[仪]摄氏温度的；百分度的

trans.tran_cn: 摄氏的；[仪] 摄氏温度的；百分度的
trans.tran_en: Centigrade is a scale for measuring temperature, in which water freezes at 0 degrees and boils at 100 degrees. It is represented by the symbol °C.
